definition[0]: a unit for measuring length, equal to three feet or 0.91 metres
definition[1]: an enclosed area next to a building or group of buildings, used for a special purpose, activity, or business
note[0]: prison/school yard (=an area outside a prison or school where prisoners or students do activities outdoors)
definition[2]: the area around a house, usually covered with grass
example[4]: The kids were playing in the back yard.
definition[3]: an enclosed area without grass at the back of a small house
definition[4]: an informal name for Scotland Yard
definition[5]: a unit for measuring length, equal to 3 feet or 0.9144 metres
example[5]: Their house is next to a builder’s yard.
